cast: 肯尼·麦克康米克:马特·斯通
席拉·布罗福洛夫斯基:莫娜·马歇尔
staff: 中文名:南方公园 第13季
story: The thirteenth season of South Park originally aired in the United States on Comedy Central between March 11 and November 18, 2009. The season was helmed by the series creators Trey Parker and Matt Stone, who served as executive producers along with Anne Garefino. The season continued to focus on the exploits of protagonists Stan, Kyle, Cartman, Kenny and Butters in the Colorado mountain town of South Park.
